/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with traditional Chinese buildings, their gray roofs and red walls adding a splash of color to the scene. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of daily life. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The image is a snapshot of life in Beijing, capturing the blend of tradition and modernity that characterizes the city.
